hero.title: Holistic Care, Preserving <highlight>Memories</highlight> for Your Loved Ones
hero.subtitle: Myosotis is the digital companion for Alzheimer's patients and their families, delivering peace of mind and connection.

overview.title: Comprehensive Digital Care for Alzheimer's Families
overview.subtitle: Myosotis is more than just an app—it's a complete ecosystem designed to support both patients and their families throughout the Alzheimer's journey. Our platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with compassionate care features to preserve memories, maintain connections, and provide peace of mind.

forPatients.title: For Patients
forPatients.description: Interactive memory exercises, AI companionship, and cognitive assessments to maintain mental engagement and track progress.

forFamilies.title: For Families
forFamilies.description: Collaborative memory books, emergency contacts management, and real-time progress monitoring to stay connected and informed.

forCaregivers.title: For Caregivers
forCaregivers.description: Emergency response systems, caregiver guidance, and 24/7 AI support to ensure comprehensive care and safety.

features.title: Our Products
features.subtitle: Experience our core features designed to make a real difference in Alzheimer's care. Each feature has been carefully crafted based on real family needs and clinical insights.

aiMemories.label: AI Living Memories
aiMemories.title: Keep Loved Ones’ Memories Alive
aiMemories.description: Transform cherished photos and voice recordings into interactive AI avatars. With just one photo and a short voice sample, create lifelike talking memories that can tell stories, share wisdom, or provide comfort—preserving the essence of your loved ones forever.

aiCompanion.label: AI Care Companion
aiCompanion.title: 24/7 Caring Companion
aiCompanion.description: An intelligent, a supportive companion available anytime you need it. Powered by SEA-LION AI for culturally-aware conversations in local languages, providing comfort, guidance, and friendly chat whenever needed.

features.seaLion: SEA-LION AI for local language support
features.personalizedResponses: Personalized responses based on user profile

chatExample.greeting: Good morning! How are you feeling today?
chatExample.userResponse: I'm a bit confused about my medication schedule.
chatExample.aiResponse: I understand. Let me help you with that. Your morning medication should be taken with breakfast...

memoryBook.label: Digital Memory Book
memoryBook.title: Collaborative Family Storybook
memoryBook.description: Build a rich, interactive timeline where families come together to preserve memories. Add photos, write stories, and mark important life events in a beautiful, secure digital space that keeps precious memories alive for generations.

features.timeline: Interactive timeline with photos and events

cognitiveAssessment.label: Cognitive Assessment
cognitiveAssessment.title: Track Mental Health Progress
cognitiveAssessment.description: Regular, gentle cognitive assessments help monitor progress and provide valuable insights for healthcare providers. Our digital MMSE tests are designed to be engaging and stress-free while providing accurate measurements.

memoryMap.label: Memory Map
memoryMap.title: Location-Based Memory Journey
memoryMap.description: Explore meaningful places and create location-based memories with our interactive map feature. Navigate through familiar locations, add memory notes, and preserve the stories behind special places that hold significance in your life journey.

miniGames.label: Mini Games
miniGames.title: Engaging Brain Training Games
miniGames.description: Exercise your mind with fun and challenging cognitive games designed to improve memory, attention, and problem-solving skills. Our collection includes Sudoku puzzles and picture recall games that adapt to your skill level.

features.sudoku: Sudoku puzzles with multiple difficulty levels

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started with Myosotis is simple and stress-free

createProfile.title: Create a Profile
createProfile.description: Set up your loved one's profile and contacts in just a few minutes. Secure and private by design.

buildPractice.title: Build & Practice
buildPractice.description: Work together to add memories and complete brain training exercises. Make it a bonding experience.

connectTrack.title: Connect & Track
connectTrack.description: Family connects through stories and tracks cognitive health progress. Stay informed and involved.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Myosotis?
cta.subtitle: Join families who are already creating meaningful connections and preserving precious memories. Start your journey today with our comprehensive care platform.
